thread.title: 6 killed, 13 injured in Kaduna auto crash— FRSC
thread.title_full: 6 killed, 13 injured in Kaduna auto crash— FRSC

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: 6 killed, 13 injured in Kaduna auto crash— FRSC
text:
Home » News » 6 killed, 13 injured in Kaduna auto crash— FRSC 6 killed, 13 injured in Kaduna auto crash— FRSC On 12:27 am In News by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
The Federal Road Safety Commission, FRSC, yesterday, confirmed the death of six persons in an auto accident on Malumfashi-Funtua Road in Malumfashi Local Government Area of Katsina State. 
The FRSC Sector Commander, Alhaji Abdu Bagadawa, who disclosed this in Katsina, said that the accident occurred at about 2p.m. in Tashar-Fulani village, about 10 kilometres from Malumfashi town. 
He said the accident involved a Toyota bus with number plates DKA 716 YF, with 19 people on board. 
He added that the vehicle had a burst tyre that caused it to skid off the road, somersault, and killed six occupants on the spot. 
He revealed that the 13 injured persons and the corpses were taken to Malumfashi General Hospital. 
The sector commander urged motorists to always abide by traffic rules and regulations to reduce accidents on the highways. 
He also urged motorists to desist from using worn-out tyres, speeding and wrong overtaking. Nwafor Polycarp
